channel.title: Webcams
channel.description: I have a really old webcam from a laptop that doesn't even work. I was wondering if there was a way to "rig" somehow that webcam to my tower? I don't know barely anything about the webcam besides how to get to it (as I have had to replace my laptop screen before )

item.title: Webcams
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

the cables don’t match up so I am unsure as to what to do quite honestly this idea didn’t go as planned.

I may just bite my tongue and buy a new one sometime ( or I could just use my ipad…)

Read full topic

item.title: Webcams
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:6, topic:534392”]It is possible if it the webcam uses a usb interface, it’ll be a neat little project if you have the time and if it’s actually possible with your camera

have a gander
http://www.techques.com/question/4-27415/Reusing-Webcam-and-Monitor-from-old-laptop
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20090820012857AAbnkAp[/quote]I appreciate you doing some more research on this for me!

4 pin connector all you would need to do is strip the wires of the camera and do the same to a usb cable and match up the colors.

when I get home tonight I will see what can be done thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Webcams
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:534392”]Why would you want a broken webcam on your desktop[/quote]the laptop webcam works I just want to use the laptop webcam with my tower.

[hr].

casey.:

Just go by a new one. Logitech ones are cheap and work well.

.
requires money

[hr]

[quote=“Tutorial, post:3, topic:534392”]I think ManyCam supports IP webcams (although I don’t know too much about them), which I believe allow you to stream the video of a webcam of another computer to your ManyCam program.[/quote]You misunderstand sorry :o

I have a webcam I am not looking for a place to cam but how to use use the old laptop cam with the desktop

Read full topic

item.title: Webcams
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I think ManyCam supports IP webcams (although I don’t know too much about them), which I believe allow you to stream the video of a webcam of another computer to your ManyCam program.
